turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello can I have a extra large pizza deal. I would like to have 6 extra large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sorry but this store does not value that coupon but would you still be interested in the pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I would like the pizzas and I would like 5 orders of wings as well and 4 sodas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! What toppings would you like on your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like 3 pepperoni and 3 cheese pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what flavor would you like for the wings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like 3 barbecue flavoed and 2 buffalo flavored.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright and for your sodas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will take 2 Coca Colas and 2 Sprites.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We do not have any Coca Colas we have Pepsi. Is that okay with you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wait going back to the pizzas do you have any recent specialty pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We have a cheeseburger specialty pizza promotion right now but the sizes are only available in large.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thats fine I'll stick with the pepperoni and cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright is there anything else you would be interested in.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that is all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright so you ordered 3 extra large pepperoni pizzas, 3 extra large cheese pizzas, 3 orders of barbecue flavored wings, 1 order of buffalo flavored wings, 2 Pepsis and 2 Sprites. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes you got it all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright then your order is complete and it should be fresh and ready for you in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem! Your receipt has been sent to you via text message. Is that all I can help you with today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes thank you once again have a good day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a nice day goodbye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.
